testcase.name: TC01 Kullanici amazonda parametreli arama yapar
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici amazon anasayfasina gider...................................passed Then kullanici "Nutella" icin arama yapar...................................passed And kullanici sonuclarin "Nutella" icerdigini test eder.....................passed And kullanici sayfayi kapatir...............................................passed
